import React, { Component } from 'react' import ApiService from '../Service/ApiService' import {NavLink} from 'react-router-dom' export class NormalUser extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { taskname:'', taskdescription:'', status:'new' } } componentDidMount() { const id = this.props.match.params.id this.setState({userid:id}) ApiService.getUserTaskById(this.state.userid).then(res=>{ console.log(res.data.result) }).catch(error=>{console.log(error)}) } render() { // const name =this.props.match.params.name var userdata =JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem('userloginmail')) var name = userdata.fname.concat(" "+userdata.lname) return (

Welcome
{name} (user)

TaskName TaskDescription Status Action
Logout
) } } export default NormalUser
